alert.note: Alert for Mason; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN MASON AND ROBERTSON COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Fairview, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Olivet, Sardis, US Route 62 at State Route 875, Blue Licks Battlefield, Burika, Alhambra, Piqua, Mitchells Mill, US Route 62 at State Route 616 and Blue Licks Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
